channel.title: Credentials on wunderwuzzi blog
channel.description: Recent content in Credentials on wunderwuzzi blog

item.title: Hunting for Credentials
item.description: The idea of searching or tricking victims to surrender their credentials is nothing new. Adversaries are leveraging these techniques to gain access to sensitive information. At times the term “harvesting credentials” is used which is something that appears to be more opportunistic and I would propose that security teams start to actively hunt for credential exposure that can put their organiztaion at risk – in case you are not yet doing that.
